title: Looking for Supporter, starts from Silver, Thanks
body:
Hey Guys,


About me:
my name is pyrox88 and im start to be a adc pro. i train every day in farming and more.

What do i need?:
i search a good support who dont need awesome ranked stats, he must only be good in supporting his ADC.

My Gameplay:
At the beginning i start to farm and in the middle game i go for kills, that is my Gameplay
i have 3 steps:
1. Farm
2. Kill 
3. Win 

my Main is Twitch and i start to learn Tristana and Jinx, but my one and only love is twitch.


thanks for reading this thread :)

replies.body: %%%%, was gonna be the girl for you until you mentioned they must be male.

I main support.

Morgana is my gal, or Leo if we need tankyness, then lastly my Janna in those situational games.

Have also been playing a lot of soraka lately, and a little thresh.

 was silver last season 4, and only played few games this season and placed in bronze.

if ur interested add me ign skunken
